entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
